item.title: Awesome_colors

item.title: Beautify_KDE
item.description: Window bar transparency effect Use BreezeBlurred or SierraBreeze. As for BreezeBlurred, a compilation error occurred when install on Arch Linux. But this bro gave us a available package. Panel transparency https://www.joxrays.com/kde-panel-transparency/ Component transparency Kvantum Real-time monitoring of system resources on the desktop conky Music visualization panon MacOS dock style latte-dock Shell beautification zsh + oh-my-zsh + lsd + zsh-syntax-highlighting + Nerd Fonts Grub’s theme https://www.gnome-look.org/browse/cat/109/order/latest/
